tool_description: This is an API that shows all the latest climate change news around the world.
name: Bonarhyme Climate Change Live
title: Bonarhyme Climate Change Live

api_list.name: GET specific news
Get all climate change news
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about climate change from all over the world.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bonarhyme-climate-change-live.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bonarhyme-climate-change-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bonarhyme-climate-change-live.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bonarhyme-climate-change-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
